clip_assessment.verbatim_quote: The average age of home buyers is now 56-59, and 30% of these purchases are all cash.
clip_assessment.guest_voice: Carrie speaks like a seasoned advisor — measured, data-informed, and conversational. She builds arguments methodically, using market insights to shift perspective rather than hype.
clip_assessment.why_this_stops_scrolls: It obliterates the conventional wisdom that agents should be chasing millennials and first-time buyers, revealing a massive demographic blind spot that's costing deals.

HOOK.text: You're marketing to the wrong generation. And it's costing you six figures.
HOOK.production_note: Hard cut to Carrie. Text overlay: 'WRONG GENERATION' in bold. High contrast background.

SETUP.text: Carrie McCormick is a top 1% producer in Chicago luxury. And she just shared a stat that should change your entire 2026 strategy. Because while you're optimizing for Instagram-scrolling millennials...
SETUP.production_note: B-roll: Instagram feed scrolling, millennial couple looking at phones. Cut back to Carrie mid-sentence.

INSIGHT.text: The average home buyer is now 56 to 59 years old. And 30% of them are paying all cash. Not financing. Cash. These aren't first-timers stretching for a down payment. They're downsizers, empty nesters, and investors who've been building equity for decades. They don't care about your TikTok. They want a advisor who understands their timeline, their tax situation, and their legacy plan. And most agents are completely invisible to them.
INSIGHT.production_note: Text overlay of stats: '56-59 years old' and '30% ALL CASH' appear as she says them. Cut to footage of older couple touring upscale home, shaking hands with agent.

REFRAME.text: So here's the shift: Stop chasing volume. Start building relationships with the generation that actually has the money. Your marketing, your messaging, your entire client experience — it needs to speak to people who value judgment over speed.
REFRAME.production_note: Carrie speaking directly to camera. Slight zoom in for emphasis. Text: 'JUDGMENT > SPEED'

CTA.text: Ask yourself: When's the last time you had a real conversation with a 58-year-old about what they're planning next? That's your 2026 play.
CTA.production_note: Freeze on Carrie's face. Text overlay: 'Who are YOU actually marketing to?' Fade to show logo/handle.

caption: The average buyer is 56-59. And 30% pay cash. Your marketing strategy just became obsolete.
